Regulation Name(s): Clostridium difficile toxin gene amplification assay
Real Time Nucleic Acid Amplification System
Specimen Container(s): cobas® PCR Media and Swab Sample Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Roche cobas® Cdiff Test, a qualitative automated PCR assay for detection of Clostridium difficile toxin B gene in unformed stool using the cobas® 4800 System.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated, qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for direct detection of the toxin B (tcdB) gene of toxigenic Clostridium difficile in unformed stool specimens from patients suspected of C. difficile infection; intended as aid in diagnosis in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors.
